title: Singapore Chinatown
description:
Print paper.

Ms. Magdalene Lam and Mr. Stephen Davis acquired this piece on their most recent trip to Singapore. Ms. Lam and Mr. Davis thought it would be a great idea to bring more Singaporean elements into the home - also because the old man manning the shop seemed sad at not getting a sale that day. Surprisingly, Ms. Lam had never visited Chinatown much in her childhood, not because she had yet to obtain her driverâ€™s license, but because true to form, Chinatown was outside of the two-block radius that came to be her acceptable travel distance.
